welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Arpajon, the charming city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history! We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the unique treasures this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speeds and time restrictions.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
